trans-unit.source: Allows security actions for <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref> to be applied to code using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 允许的操作安全<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref>要应用于使用声明性安全的代码。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], identity permissions are not used.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT]1> 第一页为[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/add/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，不使用标识权限。

trans-unit.source: > > In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, demands on the identity permissions are effective, even when the calling assembly is fully trusted.
trans-unit.target: >> 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，对标识权限的要求是有效，调用程序集是完全受信任时也如此。

trans-unit.source: That is, although the calling assembly has full trust, a demand for an identity permission fails if the assembly does not meet the demanded criteria.
trans-unit.target: 即，尽管调用程序集具有完全信任，则将失败标识权限的要求，如果程序集不符合要求的条件。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, demands for identity permissions are ineffective if the calling assembly has full trust.
trans-unit.target: 中的.NET Framework 版本 2.0 及更高版本，标识权限的需求较为低效如果调用程序集具有完全信任权限。

trans-unit.source: This assures consistency for all permissions, eliminating the treatment of identity permissions as a special case.
trans-unit.target: 这可确保对所有其他权限，消除标识权限的处理方式的一致性。

trans-unit.source: The scope of the declaration that is allowed depends on the <xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction> that is used.
trans-unit.target: 允许声明的范围取决于<xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>使用。</xref:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction>

trans-unit.source: You can obtain the key string for this attribute by running the Strong Name tool (Sn.exe) with the token and public key options (**Sn** **-tp** *keyfile*`)` against a file that has an Authenticode signature.
trans-unit.target: 你可以通过运行强名称工具 (Sn.exe) 获取此特性的键的字符串，使用的令牌和公共密钥选项 (**Sn** **-tp** *keyfile* `)`针对具有验证码签名的文件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Sn.exe (Strong Name Tool)](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[Sn.exe （强名称工具）](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The security information declared by a security attribute is stored in the metadata of the attribute target and is accessed by the system at run time.
trans-unit.target: 通过安全特性声明的安全信息的属性目标的元数据中存储和在运行时访问系统。

trans-unit.source: Security attributes are used only for declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 安全属性仅用于声明性安全。

trans-unit.source: For imperative security, use the corresponding permission class.
trans-unit.target: 对于命令性安全，使用相应的权限类。

trans-unit.source: The StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute attribute can be used to define strong-name requirements for access to public members at the assembly level.
trans-unit.target: StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute 属性可用来定义强名称对要求访问与程序集级别的公共成员。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework version 2.0 and later, you can also use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute> attribute to specify that all nonpublic types in that assembly are visible to another assembly.
trans-unit.target: 在.NET Framework 2.0 及更高版本中，你还可以使用<xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute>特性来指定该程序集中的所有非公共类型都是对另一个程序集可见。</xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.InternalsVisibleToAttribute>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Friend Assemblies](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) or [NOT IN BUILD: Friend Assemblies (Visual Basic)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/80e7a33a-ca91-450b-a00e-c5a7986e228c).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[友元程序集](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)或[不在生成中︰ 友元程序集 (Visual Basic 中)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/80e7a33a-ca91-450b-a00e-c5a7986e228c)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermissionAttribute"></xref>使用指定的类<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 之一<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a new <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建并返回一个新<xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method should be called only by the security system, never by application code.
trans-unit.target: 绝不能由应用程序代码，应仅由安全系统中，调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: At compile time, attributes convert security declarations to a serialized form in metadata.
trans-unit.target: 在编译时，属性将安全声明转换为元数据中序列化形式。

trans-unit.source: Declarative security data in metadata is created from the permission that this method returns that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: 从权限，此方法返回对应于此属性创建元数据中的声明性安全数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"></xref> that corresponds to this attribute.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Security.Permissions.StrongNameIdentityPermission"> </xref>相对应的此属性。

trans-unit.source: The method failed because the key is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 该方法失败，因为该键<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the strong name identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置强名称标识的名称。

trans-unit.source: A strong-named assembly contains a public key, a name, and a version.
trans-unit.target: 具有强名称程序集包含的公共密钥、 名称和版本。

trans-unit.source: The name portion of the strong name is the simple name of the assembly; that is, the name of the assembly without the file extension.
trans-unit.target: 强名称的名称部分是程序集; 的简单名称不带文件扩展名的程序集的名称。

trans-unit.source: For example, to reference mylibrary.dll, set the Name property to "mylibrary".
trans-unit.target: 例如，若要引用 mylibrary.dll，名称将属性设置为"mylibrary"。

trans-unit.source: A name to compare against the name specified by the security provider.
trans-unit.target: 要针对指定由安全提供程序的名称进行比较的名称。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the public key value of the strong name identity expressed as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示十六进制字符串形式的强名称标识的公钥值。

trans-unit.source: The public key value of the strong name identity expressed as a hexadecimal string.
trans-unit.target: 的公钥值表示为十六进制字符串的强名称标识。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the version of the strong name identity.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置强名称标识的版本。

trans-unit.source: The version number of the strong name identity.
trans-unit.target: 强名称标识的版本号。
